analytic.title: The Syriac Community in Batman and its Vicinity according to the Archives of the Ecclesiastical Consecrations Conserved in the Church of Forty Martyrs in Mardin, South East of Turkey

monogr.title: I. Uluslararası Batman ve Çevresi Tarihi ve Kültürü Sempozyumu: 15-17 Nisan/April 2008, Batman, Türkiye / 1st International Symposium on the History and Culture of Batman and its Vicinity

body.bibl: Bcheiry, Iskandar. “The Syriac Community in Batman and Its Vicinity According to the Archives of the Ecclesiastical Consecrations Conserved in the Church of Forty Martyrs in Mardin, South East of Turkey.” In I. Uluslararası Batman ve Çevresi Tarihi ve Kültürü Sempozyumu: 15-17 Nisan/April 2008, Batman, Türkiye / 1st International Symposium on the History and Culture of Batman and Its Vicinity, edited by Adnan Çevik and Salim Cöhce, 1:409–18. İstanbul / Batman: T.C. Batman Valiliği, 2009.

Iskandar Bcheiry, The Syriac Community in Batman and Its Vicinity According to the Archives of the Ecclesiastical Consecrations Conserved in the Church of Forty Martyrs in Mardin, South East of Turkey, in I. Uluslararası Batman ve Çevresi Tarihi ve Kültürü Sempozyumu: 15-17 Nisan/April 2008, Batman, Türkiye / 1st International Symposium on the History and Culture of Batman and Its Vicinity, ed. Adnan Çevik and Salim Cöhce, vol. 1 (İstanbul / Batman: T.C. Batman Valiliği, 2009), 409–18.
